cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2025

description: The gnu regular expression code in file 4.20 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via a crafted document with a large number of line feed characters, which is not well handled by OS/2 REXX regular expressions that use wildcards, as originally reported for AMaViS.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2026

description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in the add_filename_to_string function in intl/gettext/loadmsgcat.c for Elinks 0.11.1 allows local users to cause Elinks to use an untrusted gettext message catalog (.po file) in a "../po" directory, which can be leveraged to conduct format string attacks.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2027

description: Memory leak in freeRADIUS 1.1.5 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via a large number of EAP-TTLS tunnel connections using malformed Diameter format attributes, which causes the authentication request to be rejected but does not reclaim VALUE_PAIR data structures.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2028

description: File descriptor leak in the PDF handler in Clam AntiVirus (ClamAV) allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted PDF file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2029

description: lharc.c in lha does not securely create temporary files, which might allow local users to read or write files by creating a file before LHA is invoked.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2030

description: Buffer overflow in the HTTP proxy service for 3proxy 0.5 to 0.5.3g, and 0.6b-devel before 20070413, might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted transparent requests.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2031

description: Cisco Wireless Control System (WCS) before 4.0.96.0 has a hard-coded FTP username and password for backup operations, which allows remote attackers to read and modify arbitrary files via unspecified vectors related to "properties of the FTP server," aka Bug ID CSCse93014.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2032

description: Unspecified vulnerability in Cisco Wireless Control System (WCS) before 4.0.81.0 allows remote authenticated users to read any configuration page by changing the group membership of user accounts, aka Bug ID CSCse78596.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2033

description: Unspecified vulnerability in Cisco Wireless Control System (WCS) before 4.0.87.0 allows remote authenticated users to gain the privileges of the SuperUsers group, and manage the application and its networks, related to the group membership of user accounts, aka Bug ID CSCsg05190.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2034

description: Cisco Wireless Control System (WCS) before 4.0.66.0 stores sensitive information under the web root with insufficient access control, which allows remote attackers to obtain network organization data via a direct request for files in certain directories, aka Bug ID CSCsg04301.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2035

description: The SNMP implementation in the Cisco Wireless LAN Controller (WLC) before 20070419 uses the default read-only community public, and the default read-write community private, which allows remote attackers to read and modify SNMP variables, aka Bug ID CSCse02384.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-2036
